item.title: Docs: User types
item.description:
Here you can manage the company’s user types. Only users with the system role System role administrator or User administrator can see this tab.

You need to have the system role System role administrator in order to be able to make changes.

You can sort the table by any of the columns if you click on the column headers.

Buttons

  • New user type: Opens the Edit user type page with the possibility to create a new user type.

Icons

  • Takes you to the Edit user type page to edit the specific user type of that row in the table.
  • Deletes this user type. Only available if the user type is not assigned to any user.
